nodeList.description: When you cast Storm Totem, you have a 25% chance to instead cast {Thunder Totem,} which deals increased damage, and has increased duration, health, and critical strike chance.
nodeList.nodeDescription:
+15 mana cost

When you cast Storm Totem, you have a 25% chance to cast a thunder totem instead. Thunder Totem has 100% increased damage, duration, health and critical strike chance.
